sentences.en: But only on north mountains Tatar horses neigh.
Chariots rumble and roll ; horses whinny and neigh.
He heard the horse's neigh in the distance.
Still their neigh can be very irritating.
sentences.cn: 不过,它们嘶鸣起来也会令人恼火.

sentences.en: The horse gave a loud neigh.
The sound made in whinnying; a neigh.
sentences.cn: 子弹 嘶 地一声飞过.

sentences.en: We all took a hand in the harvesting in the neigh bour commune last week.
sentences.cn: 上星期我们全家参加了邻近公社的收割.
